tool_description: An api that returns data about Nigerian states, local government and states codes
name: Nigerian States Mini Api
title: Nigerian States Mini Api

api_list.name: get state LGA count
api_list.description: returns the total LGA in specified state

api_list.name: get information about Nigeria
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nigerian-states-mini-api.p.rapidapi.com/nigeria"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nigerian-states-mini-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: search states by region
api_list.description: example of region query: Southeast or Southwest
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nigerian-states-mini-api.p.rapidapi.com/state/region/?region"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nigerian-states-mini-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get  a state by LGA
api_list.description: returns all of a state by LGA
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nigerian-states-mini-api.p.rapidapi.com/state/lga/?lga="

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nigerian-states-mini-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get all state in nigeria
api_list.description: returns a JSON data of all 36 states and capital in Nigeria
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nigerian-states-mini-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nigerian-states-mini-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
